name: Harold & Friends: When Calls Ai
description:
A new god has arisen. Magic has been unleashed again, changing the face of society completely. Nothing is the same anymore. Adventure is calling, and a group of would-be heroes should really heed the call because some egomaniacs are going to take over the new world for themselves.

Made with RPGMV for the Project Default jam, which had an "adventure" theme and limited me to the premade assets. I primarily employed the default fantasy stuff, but used some of the "SF" assets and generator characters as well.

The generous time limit allowed me to make a full-fledged RPG (JRPG-style, not exactly long, but still) this time, although I still had to compromise by keeping more of the preset data than I would have in a major project. The game lacks polish in places – I went without item shops, and towns are blatantly unfinished –, but everything semi-important made it in. But don't expect anything original in terms of gameplay – it's about telling an off-the-wall story with my usual quirky humor (and some of my newfound cynicism).

Incorporates scripts by Mr. Trivel, Dev_With_Coffee and Ellye.
